info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 5 at 9:17PM EDT until April 9 at 4:24AM EDT by NWS Charleston WV
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Kentucky...
Ohio River At Greenup Lock affecting Scioto and Greenup Counties.
For the Ohio River...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Ohio River at Greenup Lock.
* WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to early Wednesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 56.0 feet, Several low lying areas flooded and backwater affected on both sides of the river.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EDT Saturday the stage was 52.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 55.4 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 54.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 55.3 feet on 01/22/1996. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Report flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx.
The next statement will be issued Sunday morning at 930 AM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING
